text: Kiya woh kehtay hain kay issay to iss ney khud ghar liya hai aap keh dijiye! Kay agar mein hi issay bana laya hun to tum meray liye Allah ki taraf say kissi cheez ka ikhtiyar nahi rakhtay tum iss (quran) kay baray mein jo kuch keh sunn rahey ho ussay Allah khoob janta hai meray aur tumharay darmiyan gawahee kay liye wohi kafi hai aur woh bakhshney wala meharban hai
